org.flowvisor.config

Class FVConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.flowvisor.config.FVConfig

  • public class FVConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Central collection of all configuration and policy information, e.g., slice permissions, what port to run on, etc. Uses get/set on a hierarchy of nodes like sysctl,snmp, etc. getInt("flowvisor.list_port") --> 6633 setString("slice.alice.controller_hostname" ,"alice-controller.controllers.org") All of the set* operations will dynamically create the entry if it does not exist.
    Author:
    capveg
